name: Face The Wind (Game Jam)
description:
Explore the rooftops of dystopian Wind City, and see how death affects life when you can buy your way out of it.

This short work was created in one weekend for the gm(48) game jam. It is mostly just some world-building, and a proof-of-concept of gameplay. It will likely take under 10 minutes to play it. The theme of the jam was "No Death State"

Source Code

I have open-sourced the repository for Face The Wind. It was created in Game Maker Studio 2, and I hope the project can help other people learn something about how the game was built! You can find it here: https://github.com/nickavv/gm48-30-face-the-wind
